messages.content: What are the nodes available in ComfyUI-TrollSuite?
ComfyUI-TrollSuite includes BinaryImageMask, ImagePadding, LoadLastImage, RandomMask, and TransparentImage nodes.
What role does the BinaryImageMask node play in ComfyUI-TrollSuite?
The BinaryImageMask node is responsible for applying binary masks to images.
What does the ImagePadding node do in ComfyUI-TrollSuite?
The ImagePadding node is used to add padding to images.
How does the LoadLastImage node work in ComfyUI-TrollSuite?
The LoadLastImage node allows users to load the last image generated by the system.
What is the function of the RandomMask node in ComfyUI-TrollSuite?
The RandomMask node generates random masks for applying to images.
What is the purpose of the TransparentImage node in ComfyUI-TrollSuite?
The TransparentImage node is designed to create transparent images.
